remarks: ` B ` is decreasing and has a lower bound, then it converges.  Since ` B ` is ` log A ` , in another theorem it is proven that ` A ` converges as well.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)

stirlinglem13.2 $e |- B = ( n e. NN |-> ( log ` ( A ` n ) ) ) $.
